title: Why Does Ice Melt Faster in Hand?
story: Garmi ke din the. Aman ne fridge se baraf ka tukda nikala aur haath mein pakad liya. Kuch hi seconds mein baraf pighalne lagi. Aman hairaan ho gaya aur socha, 'Fridge mein to jammi rehti hai, mere haath mein kyun pighal gayi?' Uski mummy ne samjhaya, 'Hamare sharir ka temperature lagbhag 37Â°C hota hai, jo baraf se zyada hota hai. Jab tum baraf ko pakadte ho, to heat haath se baraf mein transfer hoti hai. Is process ko heat transfer kehte hain.' Aman ko samajh aa gaya ki daily life mein bhi physics kaam karti hai.
subject: Daily Life Science

title: Why Do We Feel Sleepy After Eating?
story: Ritika ne lunch ke baad padhai shuru ki, lekin kuch hi der mein use neend aane lagi. Usne apni dadi se poocha, 'Khane ke baad neend kyun aati hai?' Dadi ne pyar se samjhaya, 'Jab hum khana khate hain, to hamara sharir digestion ke liye zyada blood stomach ki taraf bhej deta hai. Is wajah se dimaag ko thoda kam blood milta hai aur hum thakan mehsoos karte hain.' Ritika ne decide kiya ki heavy khane ke baad thoda walk karegi.
subject: Daily Life Science
